setting.location: Lower Subura district, narrow street between tall buildings
setting.weather: Blood-red sunset casting ominous light over city during mass persecution

characters.appearance: Group of Christians fleeing persecution, mixed ages from children to elderly, faces showing terror but spiritual determination
characters.clothing: Simple tunics torn from fleeing Roman soldiers, hidden cross pendants, bare feet from running
characters.position: Moving through streets toward catacombs, staying in shadows
characters.action: Helping each other escape Roman persecution, carrying sacred books and church treasures, seeking underground sanctuary

scene.mainElements: Street transformed into rushing river, water pouring from rooftops and overflowing gutters, debris carried by current
scene.details: Persecution spreading so rapidly through city, Roman soldiers marching with torches, Christians' possessions abandoned in streets, faithful believers helping each other escape, blood-red light reflecting off wet stones like spilled martyrs' blood, soldiers' armor clanking ominously
scene.background: Five-story insulae with water pouring from every opening, streets becoming impassable rivers, people visible in upper windows watching flood
scene.atmosphere: Imperial persecution overwhelming Christian community, believers' cooperation in mortal crisis, dramatic power of tyrannical extremes, urgent struggle against overwhelming evil seeking their destruction

composition.cameraAngle: Eye level in flood water showing people struggling through current
composition.focus: Group of figures helping each other through rushing flood water
composition.depth: Foreground churning flood water with debris, middle ground struggling figures, background buildings with water cascading from heights

colorPalette.usageNotes: Rich, regal colors with metallic tones

rendering.detailLevel: high in key areas, atmospheric distance
